name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Kotlin Engineer with over 10 years of experience delivering high-performance software solutions, focusing on Android development using **Kotlin**, **Jetpack**, and **Ktor**. Proficient in asynchronous programming and implementing **Coroutines** and **Flow** for efficient application processes. Experienced in developing modern, user-friendly applications with **Jetpack Compose** while ensuring best practices in QA and benchmarking. Adept in creating technical documentation to support efficient collaboration and communication across teams. 

Possesses a robust background in full stack development, utilizing modern technologies such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proven expertise in building and deploying cloud-native applications on **Azure** and **AWS**, leading the development of enterprise platforms with embedded AI/ML capabilities for real-time analytics. Strong understanding of microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation, while adhering to compliance standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Passionate about creating impactful systems that drive innovation.
